import React from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Sidebar.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faShoppingCart, faCommentAlt, faUserPlus, faCog, faFileMedical, faList, faUserCircle} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faBuffer } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import { useAppContext } from '../../../context'; const Sidebar = ({setTitle}) => { const { state: { admin } } = useAppContext() return (

Easy Consulting

  • setTitle('Profile')} activeclassname="activePage" exact to="/dashboard/profile"> Profile
    • {admin ? <>
